attributes.action: Ban commercial fishing within a 1 mile boundry of the entire british coast line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This argument is not only put forward by anglers, it is also an argument given by ecologists. Commercial fishermen have been seen very close in to shore with nets cast. This is very damaging to the ecosystem, damaging spawning grounds which provide food for allsorts of sea birds which are becoming a rare site. Let the sea recover.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban commercial fishing within a 1 mile boundry of the entire british coast line."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17873


Prime Minister's Office
